sentences.sContent: For this year at least, our race to circumnavigate the globe in less than 80 days is over.
sentences.sCn: 至少在今年，我们在八十天内完成环球航行结束了。

remMethod.val: circum (绕) + navigate (航海) → 绕着航海 → 环航

words.tran: 世界一周旅行；周游世界
世界一周旅行者；周游世界者

trans.tranOther: to sail, fly, or travel completely around the Earth, an island etc
